replies.body: "Four new Star Guardians arrive this patch!" The patch is out so where are the skins?

Why don't you guys ever release the whole patch at once? I wanna play Star Guardian Jinx RIGHT NOW! Ugh. I'm going away for a week from tonight and now i can't play her until I come back... ;-;{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
That is if you guys release them while I'm away.
They'll probably release it while you're away {{champion:17}}
And they did lol. Was so keen to get home haha
Please release Star Guardian skins ASAP pls Rito, you cant hold them from us they are just too cool! I need Shiro and Kuro in my life. {{champion:222}}
Star Guardian Unite!

Riot, please please stop with the trend of making splasharts look like something out of an anime. 
Thanks.

wait, so nunu mid is now no longer viable? :'( my hopes and dreams are ruined. For all those wondering, if his passive only resets on death or recall, you can no longer spam e in lane for harass, as you'll run out of mana too fast. This is bad bad very very bad. It takes too much away from his sustain ,which is what he needs
pls learn how to read or kys
uhm no his passive is the same it's just always refreshed in base is what it means, so you can use it as soon you get back to lane
{{summoner:6}}
star guardian rengar anyone???
I want Star Guardian Urgot first

when is sg going be release?
 i cant wait to get it and thx riot for comming up amazing skins desgin{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I feel omega squad skins coming.

The chroma mecha malphite obsidian skin, the W does not have the effect as same as the normal mecha malphite skin. Plz fix that.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:54}}

I have to say, the auto attack cancelling alteration they've done here just SCREAMS band-aid. Firstly, if anything goes wrong with the alteration, it will break the game. Secondly, the thing they REALLY need to focus on is making the attacks consistent with the projectiles for ranged champions. One of the most prominent cases is with vayne where you can fire a bolt, cancel the animation and the bolt will literally impact with no damage and, in some cases, reverse itself right back to her.
{{champion:136}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}}
